DOC.brief_title: Treatment IPF With Laparoscopic Anti-Reflux Surgery
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis Abnormal GER 24hour pH monitoring ( DeMeester score > 14.7 ) Able provide inform consent Willing undergo laparoscopic antireflux surgery FVC < 50 % predict FEV1/FVC ratio < 0.65 Resting room air PaO2 < 60mm Hg Unable walk 50 meter 6 minute walk test Acute respiratory illness last 12 week Experimental medication IPF last 28 day Listed lung transplantation screen Unable safely undergo surgery History esophageal / bariatric / gastric surgery History cancer ( nonmelanoma skin cancer ) last 3 year Pregnant time screen enrollment Unable obtain preauthorized approval third party payer surgery relate cost Life expectancy < 48 week due another illness BMI > 35 Known severe pulmonary hypertension ( mean pressure > 35 mm Jg RHC ; RVSP > 50 mm Hg ECHO )
